name: INTERNATIONAL FEDERATION OF JOURNALISTS
goal: The International Federation of Journalists (IFJ) is the global voice of journalists. It is the biggest professional orgaisation of journalists' unions and associations, representing 600,000 reporters in more than 140 countries. The IFJ promotes international action to defend press freedom and social justice through strong, free and independent trade unions of journalists. It also defends ethical journalism, labour rights and gender equality, among others.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Information Society
euInitiatives: The updating of the EU-Mexico trade agreement. We also cover author's rights, whistleblowers, social dialogue, social pillars, public broadcasting, hate speech and fake news.
